title: Part A
stimulusHtml:

1 point is deducted for each error

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned if indicates domain of integrand

1 point is earned if chooses component of domain of integrand containing 1 and finds all x such that 2x is in that component.

t 2 +t≥0; MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamiDamaaCa aaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRiaadshacqGHLjYScaaIWaGaai4o aaaa@3CFC@

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for integral

1 point is earned for simplification of radical, antidervative and evaluation

L= ∫ 1 2 1+ ( F ′ (x)) 2  dx   = ∫ 1 2 1+16 x 2 +8x  dx   = ∫ 1 2 4x+1dx   = 2 x 2 +x| 1 2 =7
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

2 points are earned for integral

1 point is earned for simplification of radical, antidervative and evaluation

L= ∫ 1 2 1+ ( F ′ (x)) 2  dx   = ∫ 1 2 1+16 x 2 +8x  dx   = ∫ 1 2 4x+1dx   = 2 x 2 +x| 1 2 =7

The student response earns one of the following points:

2 points are earned for integral

1 point is earned for simplification of radical, antidervative and evaluation

L= ∫ 1 2 1+ ( F ′ (x)) 2  dx   = ∫ 1 2 1+16 x 2 +8x  dx   = ∫ 1 2 4x+1dx   = 2 x 2 +x| 1 2 =7

The student response earns two of the following points:

2 points are earned for integral

1 point is earned for simplification of radical, antidervative and evaluation

L= ∫ 1 2 1+ ( F ′ (x)) 2  dx   = ∫ 1 2 1+16 x 2 +8x  dx   = ∫ 1 2 4x+1dx   = 2 x 2 +x| 1 2 =7

The student response earns all of the following points:

2 points are earned for integral

1 point is earned for simplification of radical, antidervative and evaluation

L= ∫ 1 2 1+ ( F ′ (x)) 2  dx   = ∫ 1 2 1+16 x 2 +8x  dx   = ∫ 1 2 4x+1dx   = 2 x 2 +x| 1 2 =7
